meanings.definition: The quality or fact of being done or occurring at a favorable or useful time; promptness.
meanings.sent1: Her timeliness in submitting the report impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: Paying bills on time is a good example of timeliness.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed timeliness in catching the mouse before it escaped.
meanings.sent4: The timeliness of his decision saved the company from a major loss.
meanings.sent5: The timeliness of the train's arrival made her commute stress-free.

meanings.definition: The quality of being done or happening at the right time.
meanings.sent1: The timeliness of his apology helped mend their friendship.
meanings.sent2: In cooking, adding ingredients at the right moment is crucial for timeliness.
meanings.sent3: The timeliness of the rain during the drought brought relief to the farmers.
meanings.sent4: Her timeliness in answering the question won her the quiz competition.
meanings.sent5: The timeliness of the sunrise painted the sky in beautiful colors.
